Home » 40P23 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
40 Sanidassanattika, Vedanāttika
Sanidassanattika, Vedanāttika
49.
156Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
157Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
158Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
